articles.title: Oil settles 1% higher on tightening supplies, cooling US inflation - Reuters
articles.description: Oil prices rose by more than a dollar a barrel on Friday to record their second-straight week of gains, as supplies tightened in some parts of the world and U.S. inflation data indicated price rises were slowing.
